inclusion.criterion: histologically or cytologically confirmed at least 1 thyroid nodule
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: thyroid nodule is greater than or equal to 1 cm but less than or equal to 4 cm measured in greatest dimension and confirmed by the Laboratory of Pathology, NCI or confirmed by the pathology laboratory of the enrolling institution
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: indeterminate thyroid biopsy per Bethesda System for reporting thyroid cytopathology with BRAF V600E mutation or RET/PTC rearrangement
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: cytologically or histologically suspicious or confirmed PTC per Bethesda System for reporting thyroid cytopathology
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: age greater than or equal to 18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: absence of radiographic evidence of extrathyroidal extension
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: absence of abnormal lymphadenopathy suggesting metastatic PTC on physical examination and/or imaging studies
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ECOG performance status less than or equal to 2
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: adequate organ function to safely undergo general anesthesia and thyroidectomy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ability of subject to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent document
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: women must not become pregnant prior to surgery or during the first 3 months after surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: tumors are deemed unresectable by clinical/imaging criteria
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer with a history of XRT and multiple surgeries, which may make them ineligible for the study.
